meanings.definition: A forest or wooded area consisting mainly of birch trees.
meanings.sent1: The birchwoods were filled with tall, white-barked trees.
meanings.sent2: We took a peaceful walk through the birchwoods, enjoying the rustling leaves.
meanings.sent3: The squirrels in the birchwoods seemed to be playing hide-and-seek among the trees.
meanings.sent4: The sunlight filtering through the birchwoods painted a dappled pattern on the forest floor.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the birchwoods was fresh and invigorating, like a natural perfume.

meanings.definition: The wood of the birch tree.
meanings.sent1: The craftsman carved a beautiful bowl from the birchwoods.
meanings.sent2: The cabin's walls were made of sturdy birchwoods, giving it a cozy feel.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous beavers used the birchwoods to build their dam, much to the annoyance of the other animals.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the birchwoods, as if the trees themselves were chuckling along.
meanings.sent5: The smooth texture of the birchwoods felt cool and soothing to the touch.
